thread.title: BRIEF-Teck Resources Confirmed Restart Of Coal Dryer At Its Elkview Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Teck Resources Confirmed Restart Of Coal Dryer At Its Elkview Operations
text: March 9, 2018 / 2:08 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Teck Resources Confirmed Restart Of Coal Dryer At Its Elkview Operations Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - Teck Resources Ltd: * TECK PROVIDES STEELMAKING COAL UPDATE * TECK RESOURCES LTD - CONFIRMED RESTART OF COAL DRYER AT ITS ELKVIEW OPERATIONS * TECK RESOURCES - STEELMAKING COAL SALES VOLUMES FOR Q1 NOW EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT 6 MILLION TONNES * TECK RESOURCES - SALES CONTINUED TO BE ADVERSELY AFFECTED BY LOGISTICS ISSUES IN QUARTER, PARTICULARLY ONGOING POOR PERFORMANCE AT WESTSHORE TERMINALS * TECK RESOURCES - COAL DRYER AT ELKVIEW OPERATIONS RECOMMISSIONED FOLLOWING REPAIRS TO ADDRESS DAMAGE CAUSED BY JAN. PRESSURE EVENT * TECK RESOURCES - LOST PRODUCTION DUE TO PRESSURE EVENT AT ELKVIEW OPERATIONS ESTIMATED TO BE ABOUT 200,000 TONNES OF CLEAN COAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
